localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: The simple daily practice of creating a summary of the events, actions and tasks in your day dramatically increases your awareness, productivity and focus as you strive to achieve your goals. Logtime helps to do this practice simply and effectively.
nodes.title: Logtime - Diary, tasks and goals. All-in-one productivity solution.
nodes.author: Ivan Mart

nodes.excerpt: Clarity is the simplest productivity app ever made. Run your team with a single weekly doc. Keep everyone on the same page without endless configuration & maintenance. Focus your energy on what you do best.
nodes.title: Clarity - The simplest productivity app ever made
nodes.author: Eric Friedman

nodes.excerpt: Jam on Chrome is a chrome extension that lets you comment, annotate, and even update your website copy, right on the page.
nodes.title: Jam on Chrome - Sticky notes for the web - comment right on your website
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Clover is a creative workspace with notes, whiteboarding, todos, and a daily planner. It combines the power of a text editor with the flexibility of a whiteboard for spatial note-taking, brainstorming, presentations, diagramming, wireframes, and more.
nodes.title: Clover - A creative workspace with notes, whiteboards, tasks, & more
nodes.author: Tom Giannattasio

nodes.excerpt: Create beautiful embeddable charts from your Notion Tables. Choose from 9 chart types, select a Notion Table and get a chart embed url.
nodes.title: NotionCharts - Create embeddable charts from your Notion tables
nodes.author: Aravs

nodes.excerpt: Turn your content in Notion into a business. Make money from subscriptions powered by Stripe. All without writing single line of code. Oopy host website, manage membership, and handle Stripe API so that you can focus on creating valuable content.
nodes.title: Oopy - Start your subscription business with Notion and Stripe
nodes.author: Johnwook Choi

nodes.excerpt: After months of private beta, the Obsidian mobile app is finally here! It has almost all the features of the desktop app, plus mobile-centric features like customizable toolbar and pull-down Quick Action. â € Get it today for a second brain on the go!
nodes.title: Obsidian for Mobile - Your plain-text second brain on the go, for iOS and Android
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Turn your workspace into a... â†’ Highly functional system that motivates you to complete goals and tasks on time. â†’ Engaging feedback loop that rewards you for building strong habits. â†’ Exciting multiplayer experience you can share with your family.
nodes.title: Gamify Your Life - A Notion template pack to make work fun and get stuff done.
nodes.author: Conrad Lin

nodes.excerpt: TickTick is an all-in-one productivity app that is simple to use. It helps people get the most out of their life by managing to-dos, scheduling on a calendar, taking notes, and staying focused all in one place.
nodes.title: TickTick 6.0 - Not only efficient, but also more personalized than ever
nodes.author: Damon

nodes.excerpt: Turn your notes about any particular topic to podcasts automatically. Listen to them over and over again for convenience and to retain the information better. Share your knowledge with the world with a click of a button. Check out https://www.note-bytes.com/
nodes.title: NoteBytes - Turn your notes into podcasts and share them with the world
nodes.author: Irtiza Hafiz

nodes.excerpt: A Python package to copy all your Kindle highlights and notes to a database in Notion. Plug in your Kindle device to your PC to run this script. Requires Python 3.9+ installed on your system.
nodes.title: Kindle2Notion - Export your Kindle clippings to a Notion database
nodes.author: Jeffrey Jacob

nodes.excerpt: Cryptgeon is a fast, secure, open source self-destructing note sharing service. Inspired by PrivNote, Powered by rust & svelte.
nodes.title: Cryptgeon - Securely share self-destructing notes
nodes.author: Bharadwaj Giridhar

nodes.excerpt: Notea is a Self hosted Note taking app stored on S3, that you can deploy with one click to Vercel, AWS, or deploy with Docker ğŸ³. It supports storage in Amazon S3, MinIO, Aliyun OSS and others. It's powered by TypeScript ğŸš€ and loves Mark Down.
nodes.title: Notea - Free self-hosted open source note taking app, like Notion

nodes.excerpt: Wikipedia, Blinkist and Anki go into a bar. They get drunk, they get down and whups - there it is. On knugget you can discover knowledge nuggets and keep them in mind with the help of spaced repetition.
nodes.title: knugget - community-based Blinkist with build-in spaced repetition
nodes.author: Johannes Benjamin

nodes.excerpt: UpNote is an elegant and powerful note-taking app that works across Android, Mac, Windows and iOS. Designed to make it easy to take notes and stay focused, UpNote combines a beautiful interface with a fluid workflow for a refined note-taking experience.
nodes.title: UpNote for Android - Simple, beautiful note-taking app across platforms
nodes.author: Thomas

nodes.excerpt: A stupidly simple and private text tool that I made for personal use to help me think multidimensionally.
nodes.title: Four note boards - A simply stupid text tool to help think multidimensionally
nodes.author: Vineet Kapil

nodes.excerpt: tabExtend helps you manage your tabs. The browser extension replaces your new tab with an overview where you can create groups containing your tabs, notes, and text-snippets. Visually organize it all with ease using drag and drop and handy shortcuts.
nodes.title: tabExtend - Easily save tabs and quickly create notes in your browser
nodes.author: Gabe Ragland

nodes.title: Notion Planners - Plan your day, week and month in Notion

nodes.excerpt: All the tools, templates and dashboards you need to start organising your school life. 1 Student Hub, 3 Boards 10+ Tools 10+ Templates 40+ Curated Apps for Students
nodes.title: Notion Student Pack - Organise your school life inside Notion
nodes.author: Easlo

nodes.excerpt: Mochi = Spaced repetition + Zettelkasten + Markdown
nodes.title: Mochi mobile - Take notes in markdown, study them with spaced repetition
nodes.author: Matt Steedman

nodes.excerpt: Track important tasks and projects, create upcoming events, keep notes and control expenses in one notion table. You can quickly find your to-do list or see how much money you spent last week.
nodes.title: Magic Board for Notion - Organize your entire life with one board
nodes.author: Damir Bektilov

nodes.excerpt: Slite, the collaborative workspace for your team's documents, notes, wiki just got a bit better by letting you draw and sketch right into it âœ¨ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ¨ We did so by integrating with Excalidraw, one of the best open source sketching tool out there.
nodes.title: Slite + Excalidraw - Add sketches to all your docs, wiki, notes and projects
nodes.author: Christophe Pasquier

nodes.excerpt: Hugo improves meeting productivity for teams. It connects to your work calendar providing one place to collaboratively prepare, take notes, assign tasks and share insights. â € Get on top of remote meetings with notes that connect to your team and their tools.
nodes.title: Hugo - Better meetings through centralized, actionable notes
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Slid is the smartest note-taking Chrome extension for online learning. Take notes with captures from videos, build your own knowledge database, share the knowledge anywhere you want.
nodes.title: Slid - Capture knowledge from online videos, courses, and webinars
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

nodes.excerpt: bilgge is a free service which makes you feel as if you were storing data in a real safe house. instead of saying "it uses end-to-end encryption" then asking you 8+ characters password to protect your data, it gives you power to encrypt your data by yourself in your browser.
nodes.title: bilgge. - a privacy-paranoid free service for your notes and secrets
